com.youreffect.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.youreffect.controller.UserController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/user")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Deeban Ramalingam UserController directs all CRUD operations pertaining to User based on the request URL
